message_1:
What is the trend of the following monthly sales data for a small business over a period of 12 months?

January - $3500
February - $3700
March - $3900
April - $4000
May - $4200
June - $4400
July - $4600
August - $5000
September - $5500
October - $6000
November - $6500
December - $7000
message_2: The trend of the monthly sales data for this small business over a period of 12 months is an upward or increasing trend. The sales are consistently increasing each month, with the highest sales occurring in December at $7000.
